definitions.definition: an object with a round folding frame of long, straight pieces of metal covered with material, that you use to protect yourself from the rain or from hot sun

examples.text: Spectators huddled under umbrellas as the rain poured down.
an umbrella stand *(= for putting umbrellas in when they are not being used)*

definitions.definition: a thing that contains or includes many different parts or elements

examples.text: Many previously separate groups are now operating under the umbrella of a single authority.
‘Contact sports’ is an **umbrella term** for a variety of different sports.
Two separate political parties emerged from the umbrella organization.
The two sectors combined under the umbrella of the Scottish Council.
an umbrella group including members of opposition parties
the broad umbrella of alternative medicine

definitions.definition: a country or system that protects people

examples.text: the American nuclear umbrella over Europe

wordOrigin: early 17th cent.: from Italian ombrella, diminutive of ombra ‘shade’, from Latin umbra ‘shade’.
